short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You get a lot of aesthetic symbols in this extension of ours. Using which you can make your username stylish.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
our website provides a variety of aesthetic symbols that can be used in Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, online games, etc.

Aesthetic Symbols As The Name Suggests, Are Concerned With Beauty Or The Appreciation Of The Beauty Of The Text. These Are The Special Characters Or symbols That Are Used To Decorate The Text of your name.

with this extension, you are free to copy any of the aesthetic symbols which are given on the extension. And in this extension, you have been given the feature of easy copy and paste, through which you can copy any symbol with a single click.

If you have any suggestions or feedback then you can tell us by commenting through this one extension.

So go install this extension and share it with your friends.
